intro.description: In this cheat sheet we are going to creating a simple project.

item.title: New Project Wizard
item.description: Create a simple project by selecting File > New > New Project from the menu bar.

item.title: Project Name
item.description:
In the New Project field, type a project file name.
Example: "My First Map Project"
Note you may also use the Browse button

item.title: Finish
item.description: Click Finish when you are done. If you look at the Projects view, you will see that it now contains your new project.
